messages.title: Temporary GitHub Repository Outage
messages.message:
Hi everyone! 

Our GitHub repository is currently unavailable due to an automated flagging issue (similar to what happened during the last release). This means the latest release distribution on GitHub will be delayed by about 2 days. 

No worries though; our GitLab mirror is fully operational, and you can download the latest version **1.8.170** from there right away. F-Droid users are not affected since builds are sourced from GitLab.

We appreciate your patience and support while GitHub is being restored. 🙏

messages.title: 🚀 Join the Google Play Beta Release!
messages.message:
Hey beta testers! 👋

The Play Store launch is just around the corner, but we need your help first. We're looking for at least 12 awesome people to test the Play Store version of Shots-Studio for 12 days.
If you’re up for it, please fill out the form below.

As a thank you, you’ll get the Play Store version of the app for free! 🎉

messages.title: 🔥 Welcome to Shots Studio 1.8.146!
messages.message:
You've just unlocked v1.8.146 - our most ambitious upgrade yet. 🚀

It's a whole new experience:
🌍 Habla en 11 idiomas - Shots Studio now talks like you! Check out the app language selection in Settings.
🤖 On-device AI - The most awaited feature is here! Try the gemma-3n-e2b model: go to AI Settings to download and load it. It's impressive…
🔔 Notifications that do more - with images and a unified screen on the home page where you can see all active and past reminders.
🧹 One-tap media cleanup - remove all corrupt or deleted media in one click.

You're among the first to wield these tools. Go explore, and if you love this update, support the project! 💙 

 With Love, 
 Team Shots Studio
